name: multicall
description: Execute multiple tool calls in a single operation. Use this tool when you want to do series of simple read-only operations like,

function.name: multicall
function.description: Execute multiple tool calls in a single operation. This tool internally unwraps multiple tool calls and executes them sequentially, returning aggregated results.

tool_calls.description: Array of tool call objects to execute

function_name.description: Name of the tool/function to call

arguments.description: JSON string containing the parameters for the function call

response_format.description: Returns aggregated results from all tool calls with success status and individual results
